js.title: What is the data type of variables in JavaScript?
js.answer_1: All variables in JavaScript are object data types.
js.answer_2: All variables in JavaScript are function data types.
js.answer_3: All variables in JavaScript are string data types.
js.answer_4: All variables in JavaScript are number data types.
js.right_answer: All variables in JavaScript are object data types.

js.title: What is the confirmation box?
js.answer_1: Confirmation box displays two buttons, namely OK and cancel.
js.answer_2: Confirmation box displays one button, ok.
js.right_answer: Confirmation box displays two buttons, namely OK and cancel.

js.title: What are escape characters?
js.answer_1: backslash
js.answer_2: double quotes
js.right_answer: backslash

js.title: What a pop()method in JavaScript is?
js.answer_1: The pop() method takes the last element off of the given array and returns it.
js.answer_2: The pop() method takes the first element off of the given array and returns it.
js.answer_3: The pop() method takes the last element off of the given array and return array
js.answer_4: The pop() method takes the first element off of the given array and return array
js.right_answer: The pop() method takes the last element off of the given array and returns it.

js.title: Does JavaScript has concept level scope?
js.answer_1: Yes. JavaScript does not have concept-level scope.
js.answer_2: No. JavaScript does not have concept-level scope.
js.right_answer: No. JavaScript does not have concept-level scope.

js.title: What are the disadvantages of using innerHTML in JavaScript?
js.answer_1: Content is replaced everywhere
js.answer_2: We cannot use it like “appending to innerHTML
js.answer_3: The entire innerHTML content is re-parsed and builds into elements. Therefore, it’s much slower

js.title: What is break and continue statements?
js.answer_1: continue statement exits from the current loop. break statement continues with next statement of the loop.
js.answer_2: JavaScript dosen't support Break And continue
js.answer_3: Break statement exits from the current loop. Continue statement continues with next statement of the loop.
js.right_answer: Break statement exits from the current loop. Continue statement continues with next statement of the loop.

js.title: How can generic objects be created?
js.answer_1: var I = new object.create();
js.answer_2: var I = new object().assign;
js.right_answer: var I = new object();

js.title: Which keyword is used to print the text on the screen?
js.answer_1: Document. Write (“Welcome”) is used to print the text–Welcome on the screen.

js.answer_3: window. alert (“Welcome”) is used to print the text–Welcome on the screen.
js.right_answer: Document. Write (“Welcome”) is used to print the text–Welcome on the screen.

js.answer_1: to remover specified object from page
js.answer_2: Blur function is used to remove the focus from the specified object.
